headline: Bill would prevent immigration arrests in and around courthouses
author: Ethan Weinstein
sentences: Current laws “have a chilling effect on people’s ability and willingness to both work with law enforcement and engage in court proceedings,” said Falko Schilling, advocacy director for the Vermont chapter of the American Civil Liberties Union.
